summary: O/D OFF LIGHT BLINKING.  TOOK TO MAZDA DEALER AND WAS TOLD TRANSMISSION NEEDS TO BE REPLACED.  CAR HAS 70,000 MILES.  RESEARCH SHOWS THIS PROBLEM IS CONSISTENT AMONG THE 626 MODELS WITH THE FORD TRANSMISSION INSTALLED.  MAZDA WILL NOT ACKNOWLEDGE THE OVER HEATING PROBLEM CAUSING THE TRANSMISSION FAILURE.  *JB
